Detailed Description

an on-screen console

Function Documentation

FILE* open_console ( display *  d,
int  x,
int  y,
int  idx 
)

Open a new console attached to the given display, at given coordinates. It is implemented as a 1 bpp screen buffer: you can specify the index in the CLUT.

Parameters:
d  display
x  X coordinate
y  Y coordinate
idx  index in CLUT

FILE* open_custom_console ( display *  d,
int  x,
int  y,
int  idx,
int  width,
int  height,
int  layer 
)

Open a new console attached to the given display, at given coordinates.

Parameters:
d  display
x  X coordinate
y  Y coordinate
idx  index in CLUT
width  number of columns
height  number of lines
layer  layer
